import{collection,getDocs,orderBy,query}from"firebase/firestore";/* get firebase data */function getLeader(db,setLists){var getLeaders=query(collection(db,"game1"),orderBy("seconds"));getDocs(getLeaders).then(function(response){var leaderList=response.docs.map(function(doc){return{data:doc.data(),id:doc.id};});setLists(leaderList);}).catch(function(error){return console.log(error.message);});}/* get firebase data */function getLeader2(db,setLists2){var getLeaders=query(collection(db,"game2"),orderBy("seconds"));getDocs(getLeaders).then(function(response){var leaderList=response.docs.map(function(doc){return{data:doc.data(),id:doc.id};});setLists2(leaderList);}).catch(function(error){return console.log(error.message);});}/* get firebase data */function getLeader3(db,setLists3){var getLeaders=query(collection(db,"game3"),orderBy("seconds"));getDocs(getLeaders).then(function(response){var leaderList=response.docs.map(function(doc){return{data:doc.data(),id:doc.id};});setLists3(leaderList);}).catch(function(error){return console.log(error.message);});}/* get firebase data */function getLeader4(db,setLists4){var getLeaders=query(collection(db,"game4"),orderBy("seconds"));getDocs(getLeaders).then(function(response){var leaderList=response.docs.map(function(doc){return{data:doc.data(),id:doc.id};});setLists4(leaderList);}).catch(function(error){return console.log(error.message);});}/* timer formatter */function formatter(t){var d=Number(t);/* const h = Math.floor(d / 3600); */var m=Math.floor(d%3600/60);var s=Math.floor(d%3600%60);/* const hDisplay = h > 0 ? `${h.toString().length > 1 ? `${h}` : `${0}${h}`}` : '00'; */var mDisplay=m>0?"".concat(m.toString().length>1?"".concat(m):"".concat(m)):"0";var sDisplay=s>0?"".concat(s.toString().length>1?"".concat(s):"".concat(0,s)):"00";return"".concat(mDisplay,":").concat(sDisplay);}/* function for mapping mouse click coordinates  */function cods(e,setX,setY){var posx=0;var posy=0;var TotalX=document.body.scrollWidth;var TotalY=document.body.scrollHeight;if(e.pageX||e.pageY){posx=e.pageX;posy=e.pageY;}else if(e.clientX||e.clientY){posx=e.clientX+document.body.scrollLeft+document.documentElement.scrollLeft;posy=e.clientY+document.body.scrollTop+document.documentElement.scrollTop;}/* console.log("X: " + (posx * 100) / TotalX);
    console.log("Y: " + (posy * 100) / TotalY); */setX(posx*100/TotalX);setY(posy*100/TotalY);}export{formatter,getLeader,getLeader2,getLeader3,getLeader4,cods};
